Title: Establishes the new American homebuyer assistance program within the state of New York mortgage agency
Summary: Establishes the New American homebuyer assistance program within the state of New York mortgage agency to assist first time homebuyers by imposing flexible documentation guidelines that take into account foreign documentation of income and assets.
LawCode: Add ยง2428-b, Pub Auth L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public authorities law, in relation to establishing the new American homebuyer assistance program within the state of New York mortgage agency
